column3: Cardiff School of Physics and Astronomy
column5: Why study this courseThe MSc in Data-Intensive Astrophysics has been designed to provide you with the skills and knowledge needed for a career in a range of areas including academic research in astronomy or astrophysics as well technical, development and engineering positions in related scientific
